Articles.Description: White Labelling is having an app with a consistent codebase but supporting multiple brands simply by configuring the application with the desired branding.

Articles.Description: The circular progress bar is a very popular control that designers like to use in mobile apps, also the control popularity it is not a part of the official SDKs for all the mobile platforms (IOS, Android and windows). Here is how to create your own using SKiaSharp.

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict 204 - Going Freemium
Articles.Description: When the app store first started paid apps were the standard, but now it is all about freemium and subscriptions. James walks through his latest dilemma with his Animal Crossing app and how he tried to figure out if he could profit from a freemium model.

Articles.Title: TinyMvvm 2.2 ‚Äì Shell Navigation Updates
Articles.Description: We have mentioned TinyMvvm before.  It's got an update which adds support for passing parameters when navigating with ShellNavigationHandler. You can now use both query parameters and passing a object as a parameter.
